feed.title: Richard Baguley
feed.subtitle: Richard Baguley a London based Technical Architect

entry.title: ✨Latest work
entry.summary: I am currently working at Ministry of Justice as Principal Technical Architect on the Analytical Platform. Previously at Ministry of Justice on the Prisons Technology Transformation Programme bringing DevOps capabilities to Technology Services, including Terraform, versioning and CI/CD. See about for more info.

entry.summary: This is CS50x - Introduction to Computer Science 📖 eduX link course material Goal - to get a better understanding of the fundermentals of programming.
